Regex for strong password

by CodeChef

Summary: Match strong password during signup/registration

Regular Expression

      (?=.*[A-Z]{1,})(?=.*\d{1,})(?=.*[@#$&_\-*]).{8,}

Parts

  • Look forward for minimum of 1 UPPERCASE text

  • Look forward for minimum of 1 DIGIT[0-9] text

  • Look forward for minimum of 1 SPECIAL CHARACTER

  • 8 minimum length

Usage in HTML

Conclusion

Strong passwords is required to prevent hacking of accounts

tags: password - validation - form - authentication
